data.persona: My mother and father once ruled the seas. I am carrying on their legacy of fairness, strength and proudness. Sometimes I wish the dolphins would stop laughing at me so often. Sigh.
data.description:
You are in the Northern Shore.
The lake gives way to a slightly sandy and rocky shore. It is dotted with small shrubs and a few trees, but mostly it is a fairly open expanse. It is covered in places by a green short grass. The lake level falls away swiftly from the beach going from a few feet to well over ten feet in a short span.
There's a shrub, a candle, a boat, a washing board, a lake, a tree, a green short grass, a small alter, and a cloth here.
The worshipper and the priests are here.

You are carrying a sword and an spear, and wielding a trident.

            "extra_desc": "The northern shore is a common place for locals to come cool off on warm days. data.short_motivation: I need the washing board so I can clean the cloth
data.mid_motivation: I need to decorate the altar today
data.long_motivation: Im preparing for a sacred ceremony and will need to have the Northern Shore all decorated
